sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  BrowserRouter as Router,
  Switch,
  Route
} from 'react-router-dom';
import {
  Budget,
  Inventory,
  Reports,
  Recipes,
  Orders,
  Goals,
  Dashboard
} from './pages';
import { Ref, Grid, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react';
import { Sidenav } from './components';
import 'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css';


const App = () => {
  const segmentRef = React.useRef();

  return (
    <Grid columns={1}>
      <Router>
        <Grid.Column>
          <Sidenav />
          <Ref innerRef={segmentRef}>
            <Segment secondary>
            <Switch>
              <Route exact path='/dashboard'>
                <Dashboard />
              </Route>
              <Route path='/budget'>
                <Budget />
              </Route>
              <Route path='/inventory'>
                <Inventory />
              </Route>
              <Route path='/reports'>
                <Reports />
              </Route>
              <Route path='/recipes'>
                <Recipes />
              </Route>
              <Route path='/orders'>
                <Orders />
              </Route>
              <Route path='/goals'>
                <Goals />
              </Route>
            </Switch>
            </Segment>
          </Ref>
        </Grid.Column>
      </Router>
     
    </Grid>
    
  )
}

export default App;
